content: A 47-year-old female patient (ID: PAC41732) presented with recurrent orbital cellulitis and comorbid type 2 diabetes. Initial treatment included intravenous ampicillin-sulbactam administered at Brightshore Medical Center. Subsequent referrals were made to ophthalmology and endocrinology specialists - Dr. Emilia Voss and Dr. Henrik Lund, respectively. Patient reported previous adverse reaction to ciprofloxacin during 2020 treatment at Lakeside Urgent Care.
